class="regua-navegacao"></nav><script>(function(){window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("regua"),glb.reguaReady=!0,document.documentElement.className+=" <script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script>

        $(function() {
            if (typeof glb !== 'undefined') {
                var midiasEmbed = glb.midiasEmbeded;
                if (midiasEmbed){
                    for (midia in midiasEmbed){
                        midiasEmbed[midia].videoURL = midiasEmbed[midia].videoURL;
                        new WM.Player(midiasEmbed[midia]).attachTo($('#' + midia)[0]);
                    }
                }
            }
        });
    </script>

</div>

			
		</div>

    <h3 class="agrupador">
        
        <span class="chapeu">
            Homens são de Marte
        </span>
        
        
        <span class="texto" limite="60">
             As aventuras de Fernanda 
        </span>
        
    </h3>
</a>

	</div>
</div>

			
				<div class="elemento-box tipo-texto indice-4">
	<div class="recipiente">
		<a class="link" href="http://globosatplay.globo.com/gnt/perto-do-fogo/" title="">
    <div class="figura">
        <span class="botao"></span>
        <img alt="Perto do Fogo" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/2DSVU9sFWF8_Y2bVVj-4H9W2yfo=/300x183/g.glbimg.com/og/gs/gsat5/f/original/2017/02/01/12.jpg" class="imagem " title="Foto: Constança Sabença"/>
    </div>
    <h3 class="agrupador">
        
        <span class="chapeu">
            Perto do Fogo
        </span>
        
        
        <span class="texto" limite="60">
             É comida na brasa! 
        </span>
        
    </h3>
</a>

	</div>
</div>

			
		</div>
	
	
</div>
</div>
    </div>

    <script>
    var socialCounts = "";

    if(location.href.indexOf("vogue.globo.com") > 0) {
        $.ajax({
          url: "/vogue/mais_compartilhadas/revista/16/",
          dataType: 'json',
          async: false,
          success: function(data) {
            socialCounts = data.list;
          },
          error : function() {
                  try {
                      console.log("Erro ao carregar json de mais compartilhadas");
                  } catch (e) {
                    //silenciada
                  }
            }
        });
    }

    var fill_social_count = function(url) {
        var social_count_obj = "";
        $.each(socialCounts, function(key, obj) {
            if(obj.url == url) {
                social_count_obj = obj;
                return false;
            }
        })
        return social_count_obj;
    }

    <!-- Place this tag after the last +1 button tag. -->
    window.___gcfg = {lang: 'pt-BR'};

    var po = document.createElement('script'); po.type = 'text/javascript'; po.async = true;
    po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/platform.js';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
    })();
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript" src="http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/edgcore/js/troca-sitepage.js"></script>

</head>

                .meusCincoMinutos ul li.item-menu-meus-5-minutos{

                    margin-right: 5px !important;
                    width: 93px;
                }
                .meusCincoMinutos ul li.item-menu-meus-5-minutos a{
                    opacity: 0;
                    width: 93px;
                    filter:alpha(opacity:0);
                }
                .meusCincoMinutos .item-menu-moda {
                    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 transparent !important;;
                }
                .meusCincoMinutos .menu-item-li a {
                    color: #0B8DA0;
                    float: left;
                    font-family: 'Arial';
                    font-size: 13px;
                    margin-left: 10px;
                    margin-right: 5px;
                    margin-top: 5px;
                }

                    background: url("http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/glamour-main/img/separador_m5m.png") no-repeat scroll 0 8px #FFFFFF;
                    display: inline-block;
                    height: 30px;
                    list-style: none outside none;
                    *float: left;
                }
                .meusCincoMinutos .menu-item-a {
                    height: 30px;
                    text-transform: lowercase;
                    width: 100%;

                    text-align: center;

                    width: 980px;
                    text-align: left !important;

                                    <a href="http://vogue.globo.com/Video/noticia/plantao.html" class="item"
                                       target="_self">
                                    TODOS
                                    </a>
                                </li>
                            
                        </ul>
                    
                </li>
            
                <li class="vfno">
                    <a href="http://vogue.globo.com/Fno/noticia/plantao.html" class="item"
                       target="_self">VFNO</a>
                    
                </li>

        </ul>
    </div>

            <img alt="" class="img-responsive" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/dM9FFyLEeTx8_TE18ZO0Qk4vioQ=/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2017/03/21/abre-horoscopo-vogue-marco-peixes-monse.jpg">
        </a>
    </figure>

    

    <h2 class="titulo">
        <a title="Horóscopo
" href="http://vogue.globo.com/Horoscopo/noticia/2017/03/horoscopo-previsoes-de-marco-2017.html">Horóscopo
</a>
    </h2>
    <p class="descricao hidden-xs hidden-sm">
        <a title="Horóscopo
" href="http://vogue.globo.com/Horoscopo/noticia/2017/03/horoscopo-previsoes-de-marco-2017.html"> Veja as previsões do mês de março para cada signo</a>
    </p>
    <a class="link-continue hidden-xs hidden-sm" href="http://vogue.globo.com/Horoscopo/noticia/2017/03/horoscopo-previsoes-de-marco-2017.html" title="Horóscopo
">Continue lendo &gt;</a>


		</div>
	</article>
	<hr class="divisoria-padrao">






                
                    <section class="top-mais-lidas">

    <h2 class="titulo-box">TOP <span class="numero">5</span> <span class="sub">As mais lidas</span></h2>

    <div class="clearfix"></div>

    <div class="wrap-materias">

    </div>

</section>

    $(document).ready(function(){
        MaisLidasVogue.init();
        
            MaisLidasVogue.load("/maislidas/revista/16/1/37498762/",1,1);
        
    });

    var urlInicio = "/dinamico/plantao/vogue/vogue/qtd/18";
    var urlFim = "?servico=plantao_vogue2&exclude_section_paths=/vogue/beleza/gente,/vogue/moda/gente&filtro=materias";
</script>


    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function () {
            Vogue.materias.init(url);
            $('.destaques').sliderVogue({auto:true});
        });
    </script>

<script>
    var resizeIframe = function(obj) {
        var src = $(obj).attr('src');
        var permalink = document.location.pathname;
        if($(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight > 250) {
            $(obj).parents(".materia").addClass("destaque-2");
            $(obj).parents(".materia").removeClass("destaque-3");
            $(obj).attr("style", "height:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px")
              if ((permalink.match(/Videos/i)) || (permalink.match(/Video/i)) ){
                $('.box-img a').prepend('<span class="btn-play-video" style="margin-top: 10px; width: 87px;height: 85px;text-indent: -9999px;background: url(http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/vogue2/img/ico-play-pequeno.png) no-repeat;background-size: cover;position: absolute;z-index: 16; left: 80px;">Play</span>');
              }
        } else if(src.indexOf('position=Top') >= 0){
            $(obj).attr("style", "margin: 0 auto;display:block;height:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px;width:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollWidth + "px");
              if ((permalink.match(/Videos/i)) || (permalink.match(/Video/i))){
                $('.box-img a').prepend('<span class="btn-play-video" style="margin-top: 10px; width: 87px;height: 85px;text-indent: -9999px;background: url(http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/vogue2/img/ico-play-pequeno.png) no-repeat;background-size: cover;position: absolute;z-index: 16; left: 80px;">Play</span>');
              }
        }
    }
</script>

	<div id="super"></div>
</div>
                

			</section>
		</div>
	</div>







    


    </div>

    </div>

                <a href="http://www.assineglobo.com.br/produtos/vogue/VG/?site_par=1&amp;origem_par=1&amp;formato_par=VG&amp;versao_par=BOTAONOVO" class="link" target="_self">Assine</a>

                <a href="http://vogue.globo.com/expediente/noticia/2016/03/assessoria-de-imprensa-da-vogue-brasil.html" class="link" target="_self">Imprensa</a>
            
                <a href="http://www.globo.com/privacidade.html" class="link" target="_blank">Política de Privacidade</a>
            
        </div>
        <a href="http://www.condenastinternational.com/country/brazil/" class="logo-edicoes-conde-nast">Edições | Globo Condé Nast</a>
        <div class="box-marcas">
            <a href="http://gq.globo.com" class="marca gq">GQ</a>
            <a href="http://vogue.globo.com" class="marca vogue">Vogue</a>

        </div>

    <script>
  var dadosNavegg = {};

  if (typeof nvg13574 !== "undefined") {

    dadosNavegg.gender = nvg13574.getSegment("gender");
    dadosNavegg.age = nvg13574.getSegment("age");
    dadosNavegg.education = nvg13574.getSegment("education");
    dadosNavegg.marital = nvg13574.getSegment("marital");
    dadosNavegg.income = nvg13574.getSegment("income");
    dadosNavegg.interest = nvg13574.getSegment("interest");
    dadosNavegg.product = nvg13574.getSegment("product");
    dadosNavegg.brand = nvg13574.getSegment("brand");
    dadosNavegg.career = nvg13574.getSegment("career");
    dadosNavegg.country = nvg13574.getSegment("country");
    dadosNavegg.region = nvg13574.getSegment("region");
    dadosNavegg.city = nvg13574.getSegment("city");
    dadosNavegg.cluster = nvg13574.getSegment("cluster");

  }

  function getCookie(name) {
      var value = "; " + document.cookie;
      var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
      if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
  }

  function getCADUNID() {

    var cadunId = getCookie('CADUN_ID');
    cadunId = cadunId.replace(/['"]+/g, '');
    
    return cadunId.substring(0, 10);

  }

  function getCookieGADS() {

    var gads = getCookie('__gads');
    return gads.split(':')[0].split('=')[1];

  }


  var globoId = getCADUNID();
  var iddfp = getCookieGADS();
  var idga = getCookie('_ga').match(/\d{2,}.{1}\d{2,}/)[0];

  console.log(globoId, iddfp, idga);

</script>

<script>

  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');
  ga('create', 'UA-18915097-1', 'auto', {userId: globoId});
  ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
  ga('set', 'dimension3',globoId);
  ga('set', 'dimension4',iddfp);
  ga('set', 'dimension5',idga);
  ga('set', 'dimension6',dadosNavegg.gender);
  ga('set', 'dimension7',dadosNavegg.age);
  ga('set', 'dimension8',dadosNavegg.education);
  ga('set', 'dimension9',dadosNavegg.marital);
  ga('set', 'dimension10',dadosNavegg.income);
  ga('set', 'dimension11',dadosNavegg.interest);
  ga('set', 'dimension12',dadosNavegg.product);
  ga('set', 'dimension13',dadosNavegg.brand);
  ga('set', 'dimension14',dadosNavegg.career);
  ga('set', 'dimension15',dadosNavegg.country);
  ga('set', 'dimension16',dadosNavegg.region);
  ga('set', 'dimension17',dadosNavegg.city);
  ga('set', 'dimension18',dadosNavegg.cluster);
  ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>

  	<script type="text/javascript">
		$(function () {
			Vogue.init();
            $('.destaques').sliderVogue({auto:true});
            $('.desfiles').sliderVogue({desfiles:true});
		});

    <script>
        var MenuSelect = {

            initialize : function(itemSelected) {
                jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                    var self = MenuSelect;
                    self._selectItemFromPageSection(itemSelected);
                });

                jQuery(".item-principal, .item-principal .sub-menu").on("mouseenter", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    jQuery(this).find("a").addClass( "iluminado" );
                });

                jQuery(".item-principal, .item-principal .sub-menu").on("mouseleave", function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    jQuery(this).find("a").removeClass( "iluminado" );
                });
            },

            _selectItemFromPageSection : function(item) {
                var selected = false;

                jQuery.each(jQuery(".item-principal a"), function(index,obj) {
                    documentObjectModelAnchors = jQuery(obj);
                    var anchorText = documentObjectModelAnchors[0].innerHTML;
                    descricao = anchorText.toUpperCase();
                    descricao = descricao.replace("&", "E");
                    descricao = descricao.replace(/\s{1,}/g, '');
                    item = item.toUpperCase();
                    if(descricao == item) {
                        jQuery(obj).addClass( "iluminado" );
                        selected = true;
                    }
                })
            }


        };
    </script>

    <!-- Tags IVC -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var ivcUrl = ("https:" == document.location.protocol ? "https://datpdpmej1fn2.cloudfront.net/" :
        "http://ivccftag.ivcbrasil.org.br/") + "ivc.js";
        ;(function(p,l,o,w,i,n,g){if(!p[i]){p.GlobalIvcNamespace=p.GlobalIvcNamespace||[];
        p.GlobalIvcNamespace.push(i);p[i]=function(){(p[i].q=p[i].q||[]).push(arguments)
        };p[i].q=p[i].q||[];n=l.createElement(o);g=l.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];n.async=1;
        n.src=w;g.parentNode.insertBefore(n,g)}}(window,document,"script",ivcUrl,"ivc"));

        window.ivc('newTracker', 'cf', 'ivccf.ivcbrasil.org.br', {
            idWeb: '143'
        });

        window.ivc('trackPageView');
    </script>
    <!-- END: Tags IVC -->

        <!-- JS da BARRA DA GLOBOCOM com COMSCORE -->
        <script type="text/javascript">
            var glb = this.glb || {};
            glb.barra = {
                exibeAssineJa: true,
                exibeCentral: true,
                iframe: false
            };
            (function () {
                var s = document.createElement("script");
                s.type = "text/javascript";
